title: Great venue for basketball
text: Attended a Nets game and had a fantastic time. Easy to get to via subway (Atlantic Ave station right there), good food options, excellent sightlines from upper deck. Staff was friendly.

title: Good arena but pricey
text: Nice modern arena with good amenities. Food and drinks are very expensive though. $15 for a beer and $8 for a hot dog. The seats are comfortable but close together.

title: Smoking issues ruined experience
text: People smoking marijuana in the concourse and bathrooms. Security does nothing about it. The smell was overwhelming. Ruined our family experience with kids.

title: Cramped concourse areas
text: The arena looks impressive from outside but inside the concourse is very cramped and narrow. Hard to move around at halftime. Food lines are long.

title: Liberty games are incredible
text: Best atmosphere in Brooklyn! The Liberty fans are so passionate and the energy is electric. Way better than Nets games honestly. Championship vibes!

title: Concert was amazing
text: Saw a concert here and the sound quality was excellent. Good views from most seats. Getting out after was a bit chaotic but overall great experience.

title: Solid venue, easy access
text: Good arena, very easy to get to from Manhattan. Subway station literally right there. Seats are comfortable but legroom could be better in upper sections.

title: Overcharged at bar - SCAM
text: Got charged $86 for 2 drinks. When I complained they said thats the price. Absolute ripoff. Felt scammed. Will never buy drinks here again. Brought it up to management, no help.

title: Fatty Cue BBQ is worth it
text: The Fatty Cue BBQ stand is amazing. Best arena food Ive ever had. The brisket sandwich is incredible. Makes the expensive tickets worth it just for the food.

title: Long lines for everything
text: Lines for everything - food, bathrooms, even getting in. Got there 45 min early and still missed first quarter waiting in security line. Need more entry points.

title: Arena half empty for Nets
text: Went to a Tuesday night Nets game. Arena was maybe 60% full. Kind of sad atmosphere. The Liberty games I went to were packed and way more fun.

title: Best concert venue in NYC
text: Seen many concerts here over the years. Sound is consistently excellent, views are great from most seats. Staff is friendly and helpful. Clean bathrooms.

title: Great arena, expensive parking
text: Arena itself is great but parking is $60+ in nearby lots. Take the subway instead. Inside is clean and modern. Good selection of food and drinks.

title: Security is non-existent
text: Fights in the stands, people openly vaping and smoking weed everywhere, drunk fans yelling obscenities. Security nowhere to be found. Never bringing my kids again.

title: Liberty championship game was epic
text: Was at the Liberty championship game. 18,000+ screaming fans, incredible energy. Best sporting event Ive ever attended. Brooklyn showed up!

title: Game day experience declining
text: Been a season ticket holder for 5 years. Quality has definitely gone down. Concessions worse, staff less attentive, arena feels empty most nights. Miss the KD/Kyrie era energy.

title: Liberty fans are incredible
text: Went to my first Liberty game after years as a Nets fan. Completely different energy. Crowd is engaged the whole game, chanting, standing. Why cant Nets games be like this?

title: Ticket prices dont match product
text: Paying $100+ to watch a tanking team in a half-empty arena surrounded by opposing fans. Meanwhile Liberty pack the house for less. BSE needs to figure this out.

title: Barclays food has improved
text: Shoutout to whoever revamped the food options. The new chicken sandwich spot is legit. Still overpriced but at least its quality now.

title: Marijuana smoke complaint ignored
text: Filed multiple complaints about marijuana smoking in section 224. Security said they couldnt do anything. Children exposed to secondhand smoke. Unacceptable.

title: Double charged, no refund
text: Bar charged me twice for same order totaling $94 extra. Management refused refund saying I approved it. Had to dispute with credit card company. Took 2 months.

title: AmEx entrance was a disaster
text: Waited 45 minutes in AmEx cardmember line. They only had 1 person checking cards for hundreds of people. Missed entire first quarter. Premium experience? Joke.

title: Perfect for Disney on Ice
text: Took the kids to Disney on Ice. Great family experience. Clean, safe, good views from everywhere. Concession prices reasonable for arena standards.

title: WWE event was awesome
text: Great venue for WWE. Loud crowd, good sightlines, easy to get food during the show. Only complaint is the seats are a bit tight if youre tall.

title: Average NBA experience
text: Its fine. Nothing special but nothing terrible. Prices are what you expect for NYC. Would be better if the team was winning.
